properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND TASTE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NO, U.USER_ID, U.PROFILE_PATH, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_CONTENT, M.OPEN_DATE, M.TITLE_PATH, T.TASTE_NO, T.TASTE_CODE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC) as RNUM FROM BOARD B JOIN USERS U ON B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN TASTE T ON B.TASTE_NO = T.TASTE_NO JOIN MOVIE M ON B.MOVIE_NO = M.MOVIE_NO WHERE B.BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND T.TASTE_NO = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(B.REGIST_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as REGIST_DATE , U.USER_ID , M.GENRE , M.TITLE_PATH , T.TASTE_NO , T.TASTE_CODE FROM BOARD B JOIN USERS U ON B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO JOIN MOVIE M ON B.MOVIE_NO = M.MOVIE_NO JOIN TASTE T ON B.TASTE_NO = T.TASTE_NO WHERE B.BOARD_NO = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT REPLY_NO , REPLY_CONTENT , USER_ID , PROFILE_PATH FROM REPLY R JOIN USERS U ON (R.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) WHERE R.BOARD_NO = ? AND R.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
INSERT INTO REPLY ( REPLY_NO , USER_NO , REPLY_CONTENT , BOARD_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPLYNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE REPLY SET STATUS ='N' WHERE REPLY_NO = ?
